attributes.action: Give the British Public the Right to a National Referendum to decide whether or not we want to allow immigrants into Britain unabated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst most will agree there is necessary need for skills in this country.We have an unacceptable amount of unemployed, but the Government sees fit to allow immigrants into Britain under the guise of the E.U.The reality is these persons claim off our state and are given privileges far greater than is afforded to the very people who elected this Government in to power.We all regardless of religion or colour should be given the right to decide whether or not the British Public want this influx of immigrants to continue

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
